GUI.Components.Specific.EnvironmentRepresentation

Class ZombieEpidemicEnvironmentRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • GUI.Components.Specific.EnvironmentRepresentation.ZombieEpidemicEnvironmentRepresentation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiversionDegreesRepresentation, InteractiveZombieEpidemicEnvironmentRepresentation

    public class ZombieEpidemicEnvironmentRepresentation
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class represents a Swing component that paints a simulation environment (cells, agents, walls, etc.).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
